about us

our resort story give best service to our customers

we are available for business

Stay in sustainable style, discover custom-designed furnishings, commissioned art and innovative design in every corner of our hotel. Savor fresh European flavors with creekside dining and an energetic bar with craft cocktails. Unwind in modern loft-like guestrooms and many gathering spaces.


At Primo Posto you are getting premier service and beautiful rooms with many additional services and options. Enjoy your time in our hotel when attending spa center with relaxing procedures.
